turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm looking for some career advice. I'm feeling a bit lost and unsure about my next steps.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can definitely help with that. To start, could you tell me a little about your current situation? What are your interests, skills, and any previous work experience you have?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Well, I have a degree in history, which I'm regretting a bit now. I've worked as a barista for the last five years and I enjoy interacting with people. Honestly, I'm not sure what my skills even are at this point, I'm just frustrated.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. It's common to feel that way. Based on your background, you have experience in customer service and could potentially leverage your communication skills. Some career paths you could explore include: customer service representative, social media manager, or even something in education, since you have a history degree. Would you like me to elaborate on any of those?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Social media manager... that sounds interesting. But isn't that a really competitive field? And, I'm not sure I have any relevant skills, how could I even get started?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You are correct; it is competitive. However, your customer service experience provides a solid foundation in understanding customer needs. Regarding starting out, I recommend focusing on building a portfolio of social media content. Some free online courses could also help. I can provide links to those if you'd like.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, that would be fantastic! Thanks, I think I can start with that. I feel much more confident than I did before. Appreciate the help!
